parameters.name: EdgeList
parameters.description: Array of edges , one for each face, along which to apply the drafts

parameters.name: BasePoint
parameters.description: Pointer to a MathPoint object (x,y,z values of the base point)

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x, y, z), a vector which specifies the direction of the draft

title: IBody2.DraftBody2
description: Adds drafts to the specified faces on a temporary body. This method modifies the body.
signature:
System.Boolean DraftBody2( 
   System.Int32
NumOfFaces
,
   System.Object
FaceList
,
   System.Object
EdgeList
,
   System.Object
BasePoint
,
   System.Double
DraftAngle
,
   System.Object
Dir
)

parameters.name: EdgeList
parameters.description: Array of edges , one for each face, along which to apply the drafts

parameters.name: BasePoint
parameters.description: Pointer to a MathPoint object (x,y,z values of the base point)

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x, y, z), a vector which specifies the direction of the draft

returns: True if drafts are applied, false if not
